title: Can't set profile picture on Android
body: [comment]: # (Please replace ... with your information. Remove < and >) ### User Story As a user, I want to be able to set my profile picture. I know this is supposed to be working already on mobile and in fact, it did work for me once with an earlier nightly version of Status. However, for the past month or so, I'm unable to set a profile picture. I've looked through existing issues and found stuff like [this](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/5456) but mobile related issues seem to be solved... ### Description [comment]: # (Feature or Bug? i.e Type: Bug) *Type*: Bug [comment]: # (Describe the feature you would like, or briefly summarise the bug and what you did, what you expected to happen, and what actually happens. Sections below) *Summary*: When editing the profile page and selecting an image from the phones gallery, simply nothing happens. No feedback whether the picture is being uploaded or whether there's an error. I just end up in the editing screen again, without a profile picture. #### Expected behavior [comment]: # (Describe what you expected to happen.) Selecting a profile picture should show up in the app as my profile's avatar. #### Actual behavior [comment]: # (Describe what actually happened.) Profile picture doesn't show up as if it was never set (maybe it is in fact not set and there was an error?) ### Reproduction [comment]: # (Describe how we can replicate the bug step by step.) Profile -> Edit -> Edit (Profile Picture) -> Select from gallery -> select image -> nothing happens ### Additional Information [comment]: # (Please do your best to fill this out.) * Status version: https://status-im.ams3.digitaloceanspaces.com/StatusIm-181102-025922-fd5fc6-nightly.apk * Operating System: Android
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
This is still an issue with the latest nightly.

@PascalPrecht is it still an issue on latest release 0.12.2? if so, can you provide more details with exact steps to reproduce and device/OS specification, please? do you select picture from gallery or from cloud based storage, for example?

hi @annadanchenko thanks for actually getting back to me on this one.

Yes this is still an issue in the latest stable, as well as nightly release.

Exact steps to reproduce:
> Profile -> Edit -> Edit (Profile Picture) -> Select from gallery -> select image -> nothing happens

Device Info: Pixel (1) 
Android version: 9

What's interesting to note is that, taking a picture from camera does work. 

Another thought: since this is an issue since the very early days of Status, I wonder if it has something to do with updates between Status versions from back in the days. I remember setting the profile picture didn't work for anyone at some point back then and then this got fixed. Maybe there's something off on my phone's file system that causes it. Also, the image i'm selecting is just a couple of kilo bytes big, so size isn't an issue either.

Let me know if you need more information!

@PascalPrecht I have Pixel XL (1), Android 9 and can set up a profile picture selecting a photo from gallery. So, looks like I need more info again :)
1. Is it an upgraded app from early Status versions? 
2. What happens if you just make a new photo and try to set it as a profile picture?
3. Can you share with me picture you are trying to use and it didn't work?
4. Do you have some other picture set already or is it default picture on your profile? (if non-default then can you share this image too, please?)
5. Can you share the logs after trying to set the picture, please? Enable Development mode in Profile, set log level to Debug, perform the steps and then use Send Logs option.
